body_text:
Spitballing:

"proposed study" (vs. actual)
"proposed end date ts" (rel-eng wants to know when to double check!)
"disable ts" (using last rev ts instead)
"previous iteration for all studies" (for allowing Most Recent Change for all recipes at once)
promote "sampling pct" to a first class thing (currently parsing jexl)
responsible party / owner for a study (using creator as a proxy currently)

8261 glind ~/gits/x-shield-inflight-dashboard [git:master?+]$ node  cli.js current.recipes.json
Enabled   Approved  Preference                                          Bug         Channels  Sample %  Last Rev       Proposed End   Owner

*         *         extensions.screenshots.system-disabled              1369150     ??             100  07/13/2017     not set        mgr
                    network.http.rcwn.enabled                           1381816     ??             100  07/26/2017     not set        mgr
                    dom.script_loader.bytecode_cache.enabled            1373241     ??              30  07/06/2017     not set        mgr
                    network.http.rcwn.enabled                           1367951     ??             100  06/27/2017     not set        unk
                    plugins.remember_infobar_dismissal                  1368141     ??             100  06/01/2017     not set        jga

body_html:
Spitballing:

  • "proposed study" (vs. actual)
  • "proposed end date ts" (rel-eng wants to know when to double check!)
  • "disable ts" (using last rev ts instead)
  • "previous iteration for all studies" (for allowing Most Recent Change for all recipes at once)
  • promote "sampling pct" to a first class thing (currently parsing jexl)
  • responsible party / owner for a study (using creator as a proxy currently)

title: enhance normandy api to support rel-eng and other dashboarding.
body:
Spitballing:
- "proposed study" (vs. actual)
- "proposed end date ts" (rel-eng wants to know when to double check!)
- "disable ts" (using last rev ts instead)
- "previous iteration for all studies" (for allowing Most Recent Change for all recipes at once)
- promote "sampling pct" to a first class thing (currently parsing jexl)
- responsible party / owner for a study (using creator as a proxy currently)


```
8261 glind ~/gits/x-shield-inflight-dashboard [git:master?+]$ node  cli.js current.recipes.json
Enabled   Approved  Preference                                          Bug         Channels  Sample %  Last Rev       Proposed End   Owner
*         *         layout.css.servo.enabled                            1381147     ??              20  07/26/2017     not set        mgr
*         *         layout.frame_rate                                   1370253     ??               1  07/19/2017     not set        mgr
*         *         extensions.screenshots.system-disabled              1369150     ??             100  07/13/2017     not set        mgr
                    network.http.rcwn.enabled                           1381816     ??             100  07/26/2017     not set        mgr
                    dom.script_loader.bytecode_cache.enabled            1373241     ??              30  07/06/2017     not set        mgr
                    network.http.rcwn.enabled                           1367951     ??             100  06/27/2017     not set        unk
                    plugins.remember_infobar_dismissal                  1368141     ??             100  06/01/2017     not set        jga
                    extensions.shield-recipe-client.experiments.lazy_c  1365680     ??        unknown   05/23/2017     not set        mke
                    test.normandy.prefflip.defaultpref                  https://gi  ??               1  05/05/2017     not set        gli
```
